mil7.7.7:1.1: “Bhante nagasena, ‘maniratanassa tini angani gahetabbani’ti yam vadesi, katamani tani tini angani gahetabbani”ti?
mil7.7.7:1.3: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena ekantaparisuddhajivena bhavitabbam.
mil7.7.7:1.4: Idam, maharaja, maniratanassa pathamam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.7.7:2.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, maniratanam na kenaci saddhim missiyati;
mil7.7.7:2.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena papehi papasahayehi saddhim na missitabbam.
mil7.7.7:2.3: Idam, maharaja, maniratanassa dutiyam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.7.7:3.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, maniratanam jatiratanehi yojiyati;
mil7.7.7:3.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena uttamavarajatimantehi saddhim samvasitabbam, patipannakaphalatthasekkhaphalasamangihi sotapannasakadagamianagamiarahantatevijjachalabhinnasamanamaniratanehi saddhim samvasitabbam.
mil7.7.7:3.3: Idam, maharaja, maniratanassa tatiyam angam gahetabbam.
